test_patch:
diff --git a/test/api/test_reset.cpp b/test/api/test_reset.cpp
index 4b8486ed914c..e9ec2bc6f432 100644
--- a/test/api/test_reset.cpp
+++ b/test/api/test_reset.cpp
@@ -51,6 +51,7 @@ OptionValuePair &GetValueForOption(const string &name) {
 	    {"profiler_history_size", {0, 0}},
 	    {"profile_output", {"test", "test"}},
 	    {"profiling_mode", {"detailed", "detailed"}},
+	    {"enable_progress_bar_print", {false, false}},
 	    {"progress_bar_time", {0, 0}},
 	    {"temp_directory", {"tmp", "tmp"}},
 	    {"wal_autocheckpoint", {"4.2GB", "4.2GB"}},
problem_statement:
Add missing reset to EnableProgressBarPrintSetting
This somehow slipped through to master.
hints_text: Ah yea I know why this fails, I added a test for RESET in `test_reset.cpp`, this new option is missing from that test
